CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 21, 1956, pg. A23, reads: "Learning Early... the art of ceramics are these cute youngsters who are shown receiving instructions from Mrs. Rose Milton, who conducts ceramics classes in her Charm Studio in Pittsburgh, Pa. The children love their work and attend classes three afternoons a week from 4 until 5 o'clock.  Left to right: Mrs. Milton, Rosemary Davis, Keith Johnson and Stephany Jordan.  Rosemary, who has been taking lessons three years, has several beautiful pieces of art in her collection."
TitMainTitle: Rose Milton leaning over table with Rosemary Davis, Keith Johnson, and Stephany Jordan painting ceramics, in Charm Studio
